summary: Demonstrates how to use the ccxt.pro library with asyncio to connect to several cryptocurrency exchanges at once and subscribe to multiple data streams (e.g., tickers, trades, order books) for various symbols, managing each subscription in independent asynchronous loops.
business_intent: Provide a reusable example for developers who need to aggregate realâ€‘time market data from many exchanges concurrently, showcasing asynchronous task orchestration with ccxt.pro.
